      • runParsing

        public void runParsing()
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                       org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException
        Start parsing here. Define a ResourceAccepter here, give it to a FulltextParserExcecution instance. The FulltextParserExcecution needs an IHarvester which fetches the URIS accepted by the ResourceAccepter. Finally, run the parse-command on your FulltextParserExcecution instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException
